summary: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.
cast: Ali MacGraw|Ryan O'Neal|John Marley|Ray Milland|Russell Nype|Katharine Balfour|Sydney Walker|Robert Modica|Walker Daniels|Tommy Lee Jones|John Merensky|Andrew Duncan|Charlotte Ford|Sudie Bond|Julie Garfield|Kevin O'Neal|Milo Boulton|Stephen Dowling|Tony Landolfi|Jennifer Merin|Bob O'Connell|Ellen Stretton|Donald Warnock|Mike Wheeler|Grant Willis
title: Love Story
